headline: VARIAN DRY TURBO PUMPED LEAK DETECTOR
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Helium Leak Detectors
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model 979
High Vacuum Pump Type Turbomolecular Pump
Minimum Detectable Helium Leak Rate 5.0E-10 atm-cc/sec
Test Port Connection 1.125" (28 mm) ID Compression Port
Interface RS 232
Audio Alarm with Variable Pitch Yes
Detectable Masses 4 AMU
Internal Calibrated Leak Included
Built-In Roughing Pump Included
Liquid Nitrogen Trap Not Included
Accessories Included:
  • (2) Varian PTS-03101UNIV Tri-Scroll dry pump
  • 4 Wheel cart
Other Information
Part No: D9793535UT120
Sensitivity: 5E-10 std cc/sec, standard version
Internal helium response time: 0.5 second
Selectable leak units (std cc/sec, mbar-l/sec, torr-l/sec, Pa-m³/sec)
Maximum test-port pressure in fine-test mode: 5 torr
Leak-rate display: 50-segment bar graph (log or linear) plus alphanumeric
Pitch-controlled audio output with programmable threshold
Remote I/O: 37-pin parallel or RS-232 serial
Turbo-V70LP MacroTorr hybrid turbopump
(2)Varian PTS-031001UNIV Tri-Scroll dry pump


Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 20.0 A 10.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
